name: voicevault
description: A secure voice recording and management application with advanced AI-powered features and cross-platform synchronization

scripts.build: pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
scripts.test: pnpm run test:server && pnpm run test:client
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd server && pnpm install && cd ../client && pnpm install && cd ../desktop-client && pnpm install && cd ../mobile-client && pnpm install
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:server && pnpm run clean:client
